title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, the class hierarchies of internal jars are not displayed. The meaning of the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' is also unclear.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. Additionally, the error message should provide a clearer explanation of the issue.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open a binary project and hit F4 on a selection (e.g. org.apache.ant).
